title: Authority of examiner of drivers to cancel licenses
context: ยง286-120 Authority of examiner of drivers to cancel licenses. The examiner of drivers may cancel any driver&rsquo;s license if the examiner determines that the licensee was not entitled to it, failed to give the required or correct information in the licensee&rsquo;s application, or committed fraud in making the licensee&rsquo;s application or in obtaining the license. Upon cancellation, the licensee shall surrender the licensee&rsquo;s license to the examiner of drivers. [L 1967, c 214, pt of ยง2; HRS ยง286-120; am L 1970, c 164, ยง3; gen ch 1985]
